title: France Retail Sales YoY
description: Retail Sales in France increased 0.80 percent in September of 2022 over the same month in the previous year. Retail Sales YoY in France averaged 2.69 percent from 1996 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 43 percent in April of 2021 and a record low of -29.70 percent in April of 2020. In France, the year-over-year change in Retail sales compares the aggregated sales of retail goods and services during a certain month to the same month a year ago. This page provides - France Retail Sales YoY - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: EUROSTAT
